remarks: A subset of an integrable function is integrable.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2014.)
statement:
iblss.1 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ B ) $.
iblss.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. dom vol ) $.
iblss.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> C e. V ) $.
iblss.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. B |-> C ) e. L^1 ) $.
iblss $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> C ) e. L^1 ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d V x $.
$d ph x $.
